content: looking for a fun and functional crochet project this frog crochet glasses holder pattern is a quick and easy make perfect for gifting home decor and kids designed with bulky weight yarn this quirky frog-shaped basket is not just adorable it also keeps your glasses safe in a playful way whether you re crafting for a frog lover or need a unique desk accessory this pattern is a must-have **printable ad-free pdf versions of the pattern are available in my ravelry shop or** **here in my etsy shop ** https //tidd ly/3qy0kwx **skill level ** easy **language ** english **crochet terms ** u s terms ✨ **pattern features ** ✔ **beginner-friendly ** simple stitches with step-by-step instructions ✔ **quick make ** works up fast using bulky 5 weight yarn ✔ **multipurpose design ** use it as a glasses holder or a small dish/basket ✔ **perfect for gifts ** great for kids frog lovers and fun home decor ✔ **helpful resources ** includes links to photo tutorials & yarn substitution suggestions **materials needed ** **yarn ** bernat maker mini bulky 5 full details included in the pattern **hooks ** 4 5mm g+ & 5 5mm i **20mm safety eyes** neon green recommended **stuffing scissors tapestry needle stitch markers** **follow me for sneak peeks of new designs crochet tips and exclusive giveaways ** **instagram ** www instagram com/theloopylamb https //www instagram com/theloopylamb **facebook ** www facebook com/theloopylamb https //www facebook com/theloopylamb **pinterest ** www pinterest com/theloopylamb https //www pinterest com/theloopylamb **youtube ** check out my youtube channel https //www youtube com/channel/ucd4hdqudbfqqbbgm-bo7myg **blog ** www theloopylamb com http //www theloopylamb com/ **disclaimer ** feel free to sell the items created from this pattern but please provide pattern credit back to me when posting online and include a link to my blog http //www theloopylamb com http //www theloopylamb com/ please do not resell distribute duplicate or share this pattern in any printed or digital form or claim this pattern as your own original design please do not use my photos when selling your finished items please note that due to the nature of digital downloads i do not offer refunds on the purchase of digital downloads if you have any questions at all about the pattern please feel free to send me a message through ravelry or via email
